interface.name: org.alljoyn.Hae.UserInterfaceSettings.TemperatureDisplay
interface.description: Interface to determine/control temperature display format on devices local user interface

property.name: DisplayTemperatureUnit
property.description: The unit being used to display temperature (0=C, 1=F, 2 =K)

property.name: SupportedDisplayTemperatureUnits
property.description: Array of temperature units supported (0=C, 1=F, 2 =K). If only one is listed SetDisplayTemperatureUnit cannot change the display
